Welcome! You've arrived here after trying to visit a page from <https://visibledata.co.uk>.

::: aside
![](brand-identity/visible-data-logo.png){width='50%'}

Visible Data never got past a first draft logo. But that's okay.
:::

Visible Data was a data consultancy and training organisation run by Charlotte Hadley. In early 2025 Charlie re-launched her services as GPCDS.

You can now contact us via **hello@gpcds.com**

We provide all the same services as before - and more!
